sentences.en: Blake could see he had needled Jerrold, which might be unwise.
sentences.cn: 布莱克看得出他已经惹怒了杰罗尔德，这也许并不是什么明智之举。

sentences.en: He had been unwise and it preyed on his conscience.
sentences.cn: 他做得不太明智，这一直让他良心不安。

sentences.en: I must point out that delay is unwise.
sentences.cn: 我必须指出拖延是不明智的.

sentences.en: I think this is extremely unwise.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这种做法极不明智。

sentences.en: It is unwise of them to advertise their willingness to make concessions at the negotiations.
sentences.cn: 他们宣扬愿意在谈判中让步,这是不明智的.

sentences.en: It is unwise to be hasty in generalisation.
sentences.cn: 急于下结论是不明智的.

sentences.en: It is unwise to be hasty in generalization.
sentences.cn: 急于下结论是不明智的。

sentences.en: It was a very unwise move.
It was unwise of you to agree to that.
sentences.cn: 你同意那件事是愚蠢的.

sentences.en: It was unwise of you to get into debt.
It was unwise of you to make that decision.
sentences.cn: 你这个决定是不明智的.

sentences.en: It would be unwise to comment on the situation without knowing all the facts.
sentences.cn: 不全面了解情况就对局势妄加评论是不明智的。

sentences.en: It would be unwise to expect too much.
The company had overreached itself and made unwise investments.
sentences.cn: 这家公司不自量力地轻率投资。

sentences.en: The singer was unwise to choose songs which lay beyond his ability.
sentences.cn: 这位歌手不明智,选了一些他唱不好的歌曲.

trans.tran_cn: 不明智的，不聪明的，愚蠢的，欠考虑的，轻率的
